amendment.description: To set aside additional funds for grants for the conduct of certain hazardous fuels management activities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3540 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3540 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5500) To set aside additional funds for grants for the conduct of certain hazardous fuels management activities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3540 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3540 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
